## Install
{%= include("install-npm", {save: true}) %}

## Usage

```js
var yaml = require('write-yaml');

yaml('.travis.yml', {
  "language": "node_js",
  "node_js": [
    "0.10",
    "0.11"
  ]
});
```

Results in:

```yaml
language: node_js
node_js:
  - "0.10"
  - "0.11"
```
